query: "What was the result of my Platelet mean volume test on 07-07-2020 and how does it compare to previous results?"
resource_summaries: This is an observation record of a laboratory test for Platelet mean volume in Blood conducted on a patient on July 7, 2020, showing a value of 11.6 fL.
answer: Based on your medical record, the result of your Platelet mean volume test on 07-07-2020 is 11.6 fL. The value is higher than the previous result of 11.4 fL.
